bug.author: x0rzkov
bug.summary: [BUG] cannot see the delete file icon
bug.description:
Hi, Hope you are all well ! I cannot see the "delete file" icon as per the screenshot below. <denchmark-link:https://raw.githubusercontent.com/wkentaro/labelme/master/examples/instance_segmentation/.readme/annotation.jpg></denchmark-link>
How can I activate it ? Is there a specific flag for that ? Cheers, X

comments.comment: check the screenshot in the left corner
I see. I can also find that in my environment. I don't think there's any flag or something. It may be your env-specific like the icon cannot be loaded or not installed properly.
Please reopen if you still have this issue.
